FunctionalRequirements.Name: Real-Time Health Monitoring Dashboard
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide a caregiver dashboard that allows caregivers to monitor multiple clients' health statuses in real-time, highlighting any missed medications or abnormal health readings.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Voice-Activated Health Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall enable users to schedule and receive health reminders through voice commands, ensuring that users with varying levels of technology comfort can interact easily with the platform.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Secure Family Communication Channel
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide a secure communication channel for caregivers to communicate with clients' family members and healthcare professionals, ensuring data privacy and security.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Virtual Gathering Scheduling
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to schedule virtual gatherings using simple voice commands, facilitating social connections among clients without overwhelming them with technology.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Offline Functionality for Health Tracking
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall enable offline functionality for health monitoring and reminders to ensure usability in areas with poor internet connectivity.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: User-Friendly Interface
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide a simple and intuitive user interface that allows older adults to navigate the platform easily, reducing cognitive load and enhancing user experience.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Data Privacy and Security Compliance
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall comply with relevant data privacy regulations to ensure the protection of clients' sensitive health information and maintain their trust.
